reviewText: Hmmmm, so I played this game and its pretty simple. You just stat grind till you can make enough money to buy the stat boosting potions. Once you do that build your hp and damage a bit. Talk to Chloe a few times to progress the story. Then you will face the Underworld Knight". Body the Knight save the queen.  After you save the queen you wait a few days for her to recover. After that I don't think there is anymore I'm on like day 105 and nothing else seems to happen. It seems a like pretty troll game. I don't plan on going any further. If anyone wants to and finds more too it let me know but I pretty much felt like it was kind of a waste of time. Cool consept if you actually push the story maybe. Either way it really feels like a troll game."
voteText: 40 of 51 people (78%) found this review helpful 2 people found this review funny

reviewText:
It's the first game I've played that I can't understand what it says.

-Click button to select actions.Some actions can't do twice a day,but there isn't any hint for this.I tried several times and wonder if the game's crashed.

-The initial status of player is HP 100 ,atk 1,def 1,matk 1, mdef 1.but a weakest monster can hurt you more than 50 HP by one hit.

-Wandering in town can get more money than working.

Even though this game is free, I won't play it anymore.

reviewText:
So the developer should really work on the trailer because it gives 0 ZERO 00000000000 description on what the game is like.

For anyone curious the game is played from the bedroom of the heroin. Then you click on 3 icons to do chores build stats then go to town to solve a lateral thinking puzzle.

Thats as far as I got some stuff happened while progressing through the story.

The part I do enjoy about the game are the lateral thinking puzzles.

To the dev:
I think if you just revamped the game to focus on these lateral thinking puzzles change the video to advertise THAT you may be more successful.

To those that are interested in buying this game:
I think most of you should pass. It's definitely a niche game designed for masochists.

I would most likely play it again if there is an update with more puzzles or story.
